title: Information Technology Building / Establishment (ITE) means an establishment which is in the business of developing either software or hardware relating to computers or computer technology as approved by Director of Industries
clause_text: Information Technology Building / Establishment (ITE) means an establishment which is in the business of developing either software or hardware relating to computers or computer technology as approved by Director of Industries.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Information Technology Building / Establishment (ITE) means an establishment which is in the business of developing either software or hardware relating to computers or computer technology as approved
